title: Tree set
info: The Tree set is a vanity set consisting of the Tree Mask, Tree Shirt, and Tree Trunks. It is dropped from Presents obtained during the Christmas event, with a chance of 1.08% in pre-Hardmode and 1.001% in Hardmode. Its male and female variants look identical.
